title: Gascoigne 'doing well' after hospital stay
summary: Former England and Spurs midfielder Paul Gascoigne is "doing well" following a stay in hospital.

title: Maguire not with Man Utd squad for personal reasons
summary: Manchester United defender Harry Maguire will miss the start of the club's pre-season trip to the United States for personal reasons.

title: Will Barcelona be able to register Rashford?
summary: BBC Sport's Ask Me Anything look at why Barcelona may not be able to register Marcus Rashford as their player straight away.
